I've seeded to 750%, but folks seem to download and disappear.

They MAY be having problems with the subtitles.  I would recommend:

-play with VLC Media Player (of course!)
-click on 'Video'>'Subtitles Track'>'English' [though Chinese is available too].

HOW TO VIEW THE SUBTITLES:

I was having the same problem as glucej, until I realized that I needed to unzip the .rar file (The cup.rar) in order to get the subtitle file (The cup.sub).  Just unzip the .rar file so that the subtitle file will appear, and you'll be fine!
